channel.title: attack.t1218.011 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1218.011 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Process Access via TrolleyExpress Exclusion
item.description: Detects a possible process memory dump that uses the white-listed Citrix TrolleyExpress.exe filename as a way to dump the lsass process memory

item.title: Shell32 DLL Execution in Suspicious Directory
item.description: Detects shell32.dll executing a DLL in a suspicious directory

item.title: Emotet RunDLL32 Process Creation
item.description: Detecting Emotet DLL loading by looking for rundll32.exe processes with command lines ending in ,RunDLL or ,Control_RunDLL

item.title: EvilNum Golden Chickens Deployment via OCX Files
item.description: Detects Golden Chickens deployment method as used by Evilnum in report published in July 2020

item.title: Suspicious Call by Ordinal
item.description: Detects suspicious calls of DLLs in rundll32.dll exports by ordinal

item.title: Detection of PowerShell Execution via DLL
item.description: Detects PowerShell Strings applied to rundll as seen in PowerShdll.dll

item.title: NotPetya Ransomware Activity
item.description: Detects NotPetya ransomware activity in which the extracted passwords are passed back to the main module via named pipe, the file system journal of drive C is deleted and windows eventlogs are cleared using wevtutil

item.title: Suspicious Control Panel DLL Load
item.description: Detects suspicious Rundll32 execution from control.exe as used by Equation Group and Exploit Kits

item.title: PowerShell Rundll32 Remote Thread Creation
item.description: Detects PowerShell remote thread creation in Rundll32.exe

item.title: Equation Group DLL_U Load
item.description: Detects a specific tool and export used by EquationGroup

item.title: ZxShell Malware
item.description: Detects a ZxShell start by the called and well-known function name

item.title: CobaltStrike Load by Rundll32
item.description: Rundll32 can be use by Cobalt Strike with StartW function to load DLLs from the command line.

item.title: Code Execution via Pcwutl.dll
item.description: Detects launch of executable by calling the LaunchApplication function from pcwutl.dll library.

item.title: F-Secure C3 Load by Rundll32
item.description: F-Secure C3 produces DLLs with a default exported StartNodeRelay function.

item.title: Fireball Archer Install
item.description: Detects Archer malware invocation via rundll32

item.title: HTML Help Shell Spawn
item.description: Detects a suspicious child process of a Microsoft HTML Help system when executing compiled HTML files (.chm)

item.title: Monitoring Wuauclt.exe For Lolbas Execution Of DLL
item.description: Adversaries can abuse wuauclt.exe (Windows Update client) to run code execution by specifying an arbitrary DLL.

item.title: Process Dump via Comsvcs DLL
item.description: Detects process memory dump via comsvcs.dll and rundll32

item.title: RedMimicry Winnti Playbook Execute
item.description: Detects actions caused by the RedMimicry Winnti playbook

item.title: Suspicious Rundll32 Activity Invoking Sys File
item.description: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on command line that includes a *.sys file as seen being used by UNC2452

item.title: Suspicious Rundll32 Script in CommandLine
item.description: Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on arguments

item.title: Suspicious Rundll32 Setupapi.dll Activity
item.description: setupapi.dll library provide InstallHinfSection function for processing INF files. INF file may contain instructions allowing to create values in the registry, modify files and install drivers. This technique could be used to obtain persistence via modifying one of Run or RunOnce registry keys, run process or use other DLLs chain calls (see references) InstallHinfSection function in setupapi.dll calls runonce.exe executable regardless of actual content of INF file.

item.title: Unidentified Attacker November 2018
item.description: A sigma rule detecting an unidetefied attacker who used phishing emails to target high profile orgs on November 2018. The Actor shares some TTPs with YYTRIUM/APT29 campaign in 2016.
